body_html:
I notice that there are new environment variables TF_GPU_THREAD_MODE and TF_GPU_THREAD_COUNT in latest TensorFlow
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L332
Is there anything to do with that ? (I am using TensorFlow-1.4)

body:
I notice that there are new environment variables `TF_GPU_THREAD_MODE` and `TF_GPU_THREAD_COUNT` in latest TensorFlow
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L332
Is there anything to do with that ? (I am using TensorFlow-1.4)
